patthana15.55:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.55:2.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.55:3.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatavāre sabbattha paccayavasena gaṇetabbaṃ.)
